about.details:
Silver Pearl Hospitality & Luxury Spaces Limited is a hospitality company. The company is involved in the mid-priced hotel category, which includes upper-midscale, midscale, and economy hotels. Silver Pearl Hospitality's current properties are located in Rakchham, Kinnaur, and Himachal Pradesh. Silver Pearl Hospitality & Luxury Spaces Limited hotels, cafes and restaurants are operated under the brand name "Osiya".

The company also engages in the business of Online Marketing and Branding of Tashi Dolma Home stay situated at Bhabha Nagar, Tehsil Nichar, District Kinnaur, Himachal Pradesh on a commission basis. The guest house will be known as " Osiya Tashi Dolma Home Stay".

The company business model includes direct ownership of hotel properties, long-term lease or license arrangements for the land on which the company constructs its hotels, long-term leases for existing hotels or homestays which are owned by third parties, and marketing agreements.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Experienced promoter and management team.
  • Operational efficiency.
  • Customer Experience.

faqs.question: What is the Silver Pearl Hospitality IPO?
faqs.answer:
Silver Pearl Hospitality IPO is a SME IPO of 5000000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹9.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹18 per share. The minimum order quantity is 8000.

The IPO opens on June 6, 2022, and closes on June 9, 2022.

Purva Sharegistry India Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Silver Pearl Hospitality IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Silver Pearl Hospitality IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Silver Pearl Hospitality IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Silver Pearl Hospitality IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Silver Pearl Hospitality IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Silver Pearl Hospitality IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Silver Pearl Hospitality IPO opens on June 6, 2022 and closes on June 9, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Silver Pearl Hospitality IPO?
faqs.answer: Silver Pearl Hospitality IPO lot size is 8000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,44,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Silver Pearl Hospitality IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Silver Pearl Hospitality IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Silver Pearl Hospitality IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Silver Pearl Hospitality IPO will be done on Tuesday, June 14, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, June 16, 2022. Check the Silver Pearl Hospitality IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Silver Pearl Hospitality IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Silver Pearl Hospitality IPO listing date is on Friday, June 17, 2022.
